body: Consider updating themes with a new property that will let you specify a custom font that will, initially, be applied to the screen menus, status and action bars.
author: [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/)
title: Add new custom font property to themes.
content:
_From [lodici123](https://code.google.com/u/lodici123/) on August 11, 2014 14:51:06_

Consider updating themes with a new property that will let you specify a custom font that will, initially, be applied to the screen menus, status and action bars.

_Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/magarena/issues/detail?id=648_
